instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00850: What is 820-00850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - slowly loads osx - PFM006 error
threads.message:
Hi,
Minor water damage. Replaced <CHIP>U5440</CHIP>. Otherwise everything seems ok.
The problem is that it never loads osx, neither from internal ssd or external and the fans starts to speed up after 1 minute or so.
Apples diagnostics comes with SMC error - PFM006. If it is sensor error how to find out which one is failing?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - slowly loads osx - PFM006 error
threads.message: Found out. I haven't attached the battery. Now I know it :cool:

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - slowly loads osx - PFM006 error
threads.message:
Thanks for feedback.
Someone else can save his time in the future...
